idea-plugin.name: Base16 Google Dark
idea-plugin.vendor: Seth Wright (http://sethawright.com), Shirom Makkad, and the Base16 project
idea-plugin.description:
Base 16 Google Dark for Jetbrains IDE


---------------


Colors by Seth Wright (http://sethawright.com). Theme made using base16(https://github.com/chriskempson/base16). Theme generated by Shirom Makkad (https://github.com/ShiromMakkad/base16-jetbrains-ide)
